The recall of Sargento cheese occurred i: not in May, August, or September 2017, as claimed.
The recall was due to a potential contam: a bacteria that can cause listeriosis, a serious infection.
The recall affected fourteen varieties o: including Sargento Ultra Thin Sliced Longhorn Colby and Sargento Chef Blends Shredded Nacho & Taco Cheese.
